OUR STORY
There's a New Best Burger on the Block
Welcome to Ford’s Garage, your go-to neighborhood burger and brew joint. We serve up mouthwatering All-American favorites with a vintage vibe on the side. From our famous Black Angus burgers and craft beers, to our one-of-a-kind 1920’s service station-inspired dining room featuring classic Ford vehicles and memorabilia—here, great food and good times just keep on rolling.
Founded in 2012, the original Ford’s Garage opened in Fort Myers, Florida, less than a mile from Henry Ford’s winter home! Today, as an official licensee of the Ford Motor Company, we pay tribute to America’s most iconic automobile brand by offering a truly historic dining experience—right down to our nostalgic auto shop uniforms and the hand-hammered copper bar top at each of our locations. It’s all about the details here. Cruise in today for great food and unforgettable atmosphere!
There's a New Best Burger on the Block
Welcome to Ford’s Garage, your go-to neighborhood burger and brew joint. We serve up mouthwatering All-American favorites with a vintage vibe on the side. From our famous Black Angus burgers and craft beers, to our one-of-a-kind 1920’s service station-inspired dining room featuring classic Ford vehicles and memorabilia—here, great food and good times just keep on rolling.
Founded in 2012, the original Ford’s Garage opened in Fort Myers, Florida, less than a mile from Henry Ford’s winter home! Today, as an official licensee of the Ford Motor Company, we pay tribute to America’s most iconic automobile brand by offering a truly historic dining experience—right down to our nostalgic auto shop uniforms and the hand-hammered copper bar top at each of our locations. It’s all about the details here. Cruise in today for great food and unforgettable atmosphere!
Frequently asked questions
Have a question? Check out our FAQs.
Do you have a call ahead seating?
We do offer call ahead seating at select locations. Please call the restaurant directly for more information or visit a
LOCATION PAGE
.
Can I order online?
Yes, please visit our
ONLINE ORDERING SITE
to order pickup.
Do you take reservations?
We do offer reservations at select locations. Please call the restaurant directly for reservation information or visit the specific
LOCATION PAGE
.
Where is Ford’s Garage located?
We have locations in Florida, Indiana, Kentucky, Michigan, New York, Ohio, Texas, and Virginia. Please find a
LOCATION
near you!
What are the Hours of Operation?
Our Hours of Operation may differ by location. Please find a
LOCATION
near you!
Do you serve brunch?
Yes! We offer brunch on Sundays from 10:30 AM to 3 PM.
What is your Happy Hour?
We do offer Happy Hour at select locations. Pricing may differ slightly, so for the up-to-date Happy Hour menu, find the
LOCATION
nearest you.
Where can I find pricing?
Pricing may differ slightly, so for an up-to-date menu, find the
LOCATION
nearest you.
Can I see a food/drink menu?
Locations may differ slightly, so for an up-to-date menu, find the
LOCATION
nearest you.
Is there a gluten-free menu?
Yes, there is! Visit your
LOCATION
food menu pages for the Gluten Free Menu.
Do you have a kids menu?
Yes. Please visit a
LOCATION
page and select ‘Food Menu’ to view the kids offerings.
Where can I find your nutritional/allergy info?
We keep our menu fresh with frequent updates based on guest feedback, and nutrition is very important to us. We have provided the nutrition information
HERE
and allergen guide
HERE
so that you can make more informed decisions about the food you eat—decisions that can help improve your overall health and that of your family. We do our best to ensure accuracy. Please inform your server of any allergen or nutritional needs before ordering.
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Yes! We have a housemade veggie burger on the menu along with many other options and substitutions on the menu.
Can you have dogs on the patio?
Service animals are allowed. Select
LOCATIONS
have dog-friendly patios. Please contact the restaurant directly for more information.
Do you offer a military discount?
We offer a 10% discount for first responders in uniform and military (this does not include alcohol).
Can I get a coupon?
We do not currently feature any coupons.
Do you offer a Ford Motor Company employee discount?
We offer 10% off the bill for any FOMOCO Employee (this does not include alcohol).
Do you have live music?
We do not currently feature live music at any of our Ford’s Garage locations.
I want to play music - where can I send my demo?
We do not currently feature live music at any of our Ford’s Garage locations.
What do you do for birthdays?
Ford’s Garage MotorClub members can receive a complimentary Birthday appetizer during their birthday month when they dine with us. Please sign up for our
MOTORCLUB
for other great offers. Our team members would be happy to join your group in singing Happy Birthday to the guest of honor.
I would like to sell something to you (equipment, food, marketing ideas, Ford cars/parts).
Please use the
CONTACT FORM
.
May I suggest a new location for a Ford’s Garage?
We would love to hear from you! Please use the
CONTACT FORM
.
Who may I contact about franchising?
Please visit the
FRANCHISE PAGE
for any investor and franchising requests.
Who can I contact to discuss a donation?
Please use the
CONTACT FORM
. Written requests should be submitted 30 days prior to the date the donation is needed. Unfortunately, we can’t say “yes” to every request that we receive. Please accept our apologies if we are not able to help your organization at this time.
How can I apply?
Please visit our
CAREERS PAGE
for all available openings.
How can I check my gift card balance?
Visit our
GIFT CARD PAGE
to check balance, as well as purchase Gift Cards by email or via mail.
Where may I submit feedback?
We strive to offer an amazing experience each and every time. In the event you would like to provide us a compliment or critique, please let us know by
FILLING OUT THIS FORM
.
Do you have a loyalty program?
Yes, please visit our
MOTORCLUB PAGE
for more information.
VIEW MORE
VIEW LESS

OUR STORY
There's a New Best Burger on the Block
Welcome to Ford’s Garage, your go-to neighborhood burger and brew joint. We serve up mouthwatering All-American favorites with a vintage vibe on the side. From our famous Black Angus burgers and craft beers, to our one-of-a-kind 1920’s service station-inspired dining room featuring classic Ford vehicles and memorabilia—here, great food and good times just keep on rolling.
Founded in 2012, the original Ford’s Garage opened in Fort Myers, Florida, less than a mile from Henry Ford’s winter home! Today, as an official licensee of the Ford Motor Company, we pay tribute to America’s most iconic automobile brand by offering a truly historic dining experience—right down to our nostalgic auto shop uniforms and the hand-hammered copper bar top at each of our locations. It’s all about the details here. Cruise in today for great food and unforgettable atmosphere!
There's a New Best Burger on the Block
Welcome to Ford’s Garage, your go-to neighborhood burger and brew joint. We serve up mouthwatering All-American favorites with a vintage vibe on the side. From our famous Black Angus burgers and craft beers, to our one-of-a-kind 1920’s service station-inspired dining room featuring classic Ford vehicles and memorabilia—here, great food and good times just keep on rolling.
Founded in 2012, the original Ford’s Garage opened in Fort Myers, Florida, less than a mile from Henry Ford’s winter home! Today, as an official licensee of the Ford Motor Company, we pay tribute to America’s most iconic automobile brand by offering a truly historic dining experience—right down to our nostalgic auto shop uniforms and the hand-hammered copper bar top at each of our locations. It’s all about the details here. Cruise in today for great food and unforgettable atmosphere!
Frequently asked questions
Have a question? Check out our FAQs.
Do you have a call ahead seating?
We do offer call ahead seating at select locations. Please call the restaurant directly for more information or visit a
LOCATION PAGE
.
Can I order online?
Yes, please visit our
ONLINE ORDERING SITE
to order pickup.
Do you take reservations?
We do offer reservations at select locations. Please call the restaurant directly for reservation information or visit the specific
LOCATION PAGE
.
Where is Ford’s Garage located?
We have locations in Florida, Indiana, Kentucky, Michigan, New York, Ohio, Texas, and Virginia. Please find a
LOCATION
near you!
What are the Hours of Operation?
Our Hours of Operation may differ by location. Please find a
LOCATION
near you!
Do you serve brunch?
Yes! We offer brunch on Sundays from 10:30 AM to 3 PM.
What is your Happy Hour?
We do offer Happy Hour at select locations. Pricing may differ slightly, so for the up-to-date Happy Hour menu, find the
LOCATION
nearest you.
Where can I find pricing?
Pricing may differ slightly, so for an up-to-date menu, find the
LOCATION
nearest you.
Can I see a food/drink menu?
Locations may differ slightly, so for an up-to-date menu, find the
LOCATION
nearest you.
Is there a gluten-free menu?
Yes, there is! Visit your
LOCATION
food menu pages for the Gluten Free Menu.
Do you have a kids menu?
Yes. Please visit a
LOCATION
page and select ‘Food Menu’ to view the kids offerings.
Where can I find your nutritional/allergy info?
We keep our menu fresh with frequent updates based on guest feedback, and nutrition is very important to us. We have provided the nutrition information
HERE
and allergen guide
HERE
so that you can make more informed decisions about the food you eat—decisions that can help improve your overall health and that of your family. We do our best to ensure accuracy. Please inform your server of any allergen or nutritional needs before ordering.
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Yes! We have a housemade veggie burger on the menu along with many other options and substitutions on the menu.
Can you have dogs on the patio?
Service animals are allowed. Select
LOCATIONS
have dog-friendly patios. Please contact the restaurant directly for more information.
Do you offer a military discount?
We offer a 10% discount for first responders in uniform and military (this does not include alcohol).
Can I get a coupon?
We do not currently feature any coupons.
Do you offer a Ford Motor Company employee discount?
We offer 10% off the bill for any FOMOCO Employee (this does not include alcohol).
Do you have live music?
We do not currently feature live music at any of our Ford’s Garage locations.
I want to play music - where can I send my demo?
We do not currently feature live music at any of our Ford’s Garage locations.
What do you do for birthdays?
Ford’s Garage MotorClub members can receive a complimentary Birthday appetizer during their birthday month when they dine with us. Please sign up for our
MOTORCLUB
for other great offers. Our team members would be happy to join your group in singing Happy Birthday to the guest of honor.
I would like to sell something to you (equipment, food, marketing ideas, Ford cars/parts).
Please use the
CONTACT FORM
.
May I suggest a new location for a Ford’s Garage?
We would love to hear from you! Please use the
CONTACT FORM
.
Who may I contact about franchising?
Please visit the
FRANCHISE PAGE
for any investor and franchising requests.
Who can I contact to discuss a donation?
Please use the
CONTACT FORM
. Written requests should be submitted 30 days prior to the date the donation is needed. Unfortunately, we can’t say “yes” to every request that we receive. Please accept our apologies if we are not able to help your organization at this time.
How can I apply?
Please visit our
CAREERS PAGE
for all available openings.
How can I check my gift card balance?
Visit our
GIFT CARD PAGE
to check balance, as well as purchase Gift Cards by email or via mail.
Where may I submit feedback?
We strive to offer an amazing experience each and every time. In the event you would like to provide us a compliment or critique, please let us know by
FILLING OUT THIS FORM
.
Do you have a loyalty program?
Yes, please visit our
MOTORCLUB PAGE
for more information.
